params._draws: draw array for which to calculate prize amounts for
params._pickIndicesForDraws: The encoded pick indices for all Draws. Expected to be just indices of winning claims. Populated values must be less than totalUserPicks.
params._user: User for which to calcualte prize amount

returns._0: An array of amount of prizes awardable

params._drawSettingsManager: Address of the DrawSettingsManager. Can be different from the contract owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._claimableDraw: The address of the ClaimableDraw to update with the updated DrawSettings

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: TsunamiDrawCalculator is an implmentation of an IDrawCalculator

ClaimableDrawSet(address).notice: Emitted when the claimableDraw is set/updated

DrawSettingsSet(uint32,(uint8,uint16,uin.notice: Emitted when the DrawParams are set/updated

Initialized(address).notice: Emitted when the contract is initialized

calculate(address,(uint256,uint32,uint32.notice: Calulates the prize amount for a user for Multiple Draws. Typically called by a ClaimableDraw.

setClaimableDraw(address).notice: Sets DrawSettings for a draw id. only callable by the owner or manager

setDrawSettings(uint32,(uint8,uint16,uin.notice: Sets DrawSettings for a draw id. only callable by the owner or manager
